paragraphs.start-one: Welcome to the “Animal Market” marketplace page!
paragraphs.start-two: “Animal Market” is a pet project that is not profitable or commercial. The marketplace was created while participating in the Team Challenge project. More information about Team Challenge can be found at
paragraphs.start-three: These Terms of Use set forth the terms and conditions that govern your use of our marketplace and services. By accessing or using “Animal Market”, you agree to be bound by and comply with these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using our platform.
paragraphs.end-one: Thank you for being a part of our community!

list.list-one: By using “Animal Market”, you represent that you are at least 18 years of age or have reached the age of majority in your jurisdiction. Users under the age of 18 must have the consent of a parent or legal guardian to use our services.
list.list-two: To access certain features of the Marketplace, you may be required to create an account. You agree to provide accurate, current and complete information during the registration process. You are also responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials.
list.list-three-a: You agree to use “Animal Market” solely to search for animals and publish ads for the sale of animals.
list.list-three-b: On the Animal Market page, you can post ads, view ads of other users, send and receive messages from other users.
list.list-four-a: Sellers are responsible for providing accurate and up-to-date information in their ads. Buyers are responsible for reviewing the details of the item before making a purchase.
list.list-four-b: The ad must include the current price. If you are selling a set/set of items, the price must be for the entire set/set of items.
list.list-five-a: “Animal Market” website prohibits any actions that may violate local, regional, national or international laws or regulations.
list.list-five-b: Users of the site undertake not to take actions that will impede or destroy the operation of the marketplace.
list.list-five-c: It is forbidden to distribute and publish materials that violate the rights of others, including intellectual property rights, terrorist content, as well as discriminatory or racist content.
list.list-six-a: Please note that “Animal Market” does not have the ability to make payments on the site.
list.list-six-b: To make a payment, please use secure online payment methods such as PayPal or other popular payment systems. Avoid cash transactions as they can be risky.
list.list-six-c: “Animal Market” is not responsible for actions performed outside the site (payment, transfer of goods in person, etc.)
list.list-seven-a: You can view and update your account information in the settings.
list.list-seven-b: “Animal Market” reserves the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for any reason, including violation of these Terms of Use.
list.list-eight: We may update these Terms of Use from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page and the date of the last update will be changed accordingly.
list.list-nine: If you have any questions or comments about our Terms of Use, please contact us at [contact@email.com].

paragraphs.start-three: The Animal Market pet project team cares about your personal data and does everything possible to protect it. This Privacy Policy is written to help you understand what personal data is collected, stored and used and what happens to it when you use the marketplace
paragraphs.start-four: (here in after referred to as the Site).
paragraphs.end-one: By using Animal Market, you acknowledge and agree to the terms and conditions described in this Privacy Policy.
paragraphs.end-two: Thank you for being part of our community!

list.list-one-a: When registering an account, we collect data such as your name, email address, phone number and address of residence for your further comfortable use of the site.
list.list-one-b: User-generated information We collect any information, including text, images, and videos, that you provide to us voluntarily (product announcements, reviews, and comments left on the site).
list.list-one-c: Automatically collected information We also automatically collect data such as your IP address, browser type, device information and usage patterns to improve your user experience and to improve our services.
list.list-two-a: We may use your contact information to communicate with you regarding orders, promotions, and important updates regarding our marketplace.
list.list-two-b: Analyzing user behavior helps us to improve our website, optimize the user experience and personalize content according to your preferences.
list.list-three-a: We may share your information with trusted service providers who help us operate our marketplace and serve you.
list.list-three-b: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or to protect our rights, comply with legal process, or answer legal questions.
list.list-four-a: You can view and update your account information in the settings.
list.list-four-b: You can manage your notifications and opt-out of receiving promotional emails.
list.list-five-a: The security of your personal data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
list.list-five-b: We try to use reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data, but we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
list.list-six: Our services are not directed to anyone under the age of 16. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us and we will take steps to remove such information.
list.list-seven: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page and the date of the last update will be changed accordingly.
list.list-eight: If you have any questions or comments about our Privacy Policy or our handling of your personal information, please contact us at [contact@email.com].
